dedup.name: dedup
dedup.description: Removes duplicates from a list of records.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The list of fields used to deduplicate

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: If you want to pick a particular record out of the duplicates, you can use the sort parameter

filter.name: filter
filter.description: Reduces the number of records in a list by keeping only those records that match the specified condition.

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: The condition to keep the records.

filterOut.description: Removes records that match a specific condition.
filterOut.name: filterOut

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: The condition to keep the records.

search.name: search
search.description: Searches for records that match the specified search condition.

parameters.name: condition
parameters.description: The condition used when searching for records.
